title: Reported Speech - Questions 3
instructions: Put the sentences into reported speech.
exa:
What did you go?
He asked me what I had done.

contents.longsent: How much coffee do you drink?
Why didn't you call me back?
alters: why I hadn't called him back.

contents.longsent: Why can't my parents understand each other?
alters: why my parents couldn't understand each other.

contents.longsent: How long were you in prison?
contents.starter: My new employer wanted to know...
alters: how long I had been in prison.

contents.longsent: When will this fucking dog stop barking?
alters: when this fucking dog would stop barking.

contents.longsent: Why is the bus full of jerks every morning?
alters: why the bus was full of jerks every morning.
